text:
Hello,
This component is only  able to reach throughput for a test that last enough time, your test lasts 2 minutes, it's not enough.
Also you need to ensure you have enough threads to reach target throughput.

In both case, it is better to ask on jmeter user mailing list before opening a bug.

So I am closing as Invalid for now.
Feel free to reopen with more details and sample test plan.

Thank you
